{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Long Range Wireless PC Card |caption2 = with Two Antenna Jacks for Embedded System |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Senao |model = SL-2511CD Plus EXT2 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = B11 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCMCIA (16-bit) |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = NI3-2511CD-PLUS3 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:02:6F
|chip1 = Intersil;ISL3873B; |chip2 = Intersil;ISL3685; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = MMCX |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = Yes |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;RFMD;RF2163;RF, 2163, 0124, 23E9;1; |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = b |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/12/2002 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This was, at one point, a rather popular card.. thanks to it's 100 mW / 200 mW power output and high receiver sensitivity. :It was also sold (and may be more common) as the [[EnGenius NL-2511CD PLUS EXT2]].
Additional specifications, per '''Senao''''s datasheet (mirrored here), follow...
'''RF Output Power''' *23 dBm (FCC models), 20 dBm (CE models) {{802dot11 RxSens|11b |info=FER = 0.08 |1M=-95 |2M=-93 |5.5M=-91 |11M=-89 }}
==='''hostap diag''' + addl. info dumps=== {{hostap_diag |nicid=800c |pri_id=0015 |pri_ver=1.1.1 |sta_id=001f |sta_ver=1.7.4}} .. however, the STA firmware was upgraded.
==Links of Interest== *[https://deviwiki.com/files/datasheets/senao/NL-2511CD-PLUS-EXT2.pdf Datasheet] *[http://seattlewireless.net/index.cgi/SenaoCard ''Senao Card'' on the '''Seattle Wireless''' Wiki]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Senao sl2511cd+ ext2 pcb top.jpg|top of the board (RF shield removed) File:Senao sl2511cd+ ext2 pcb bot.jpg|bottom of the board </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
